wf_workflow_version.description: Ask Me Anything / Open Channel workflow
wf_workflow_version.name: Open Channel Workflow
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

wf_workflow.description: Ask Me Anything / Open Channel workflow
wf_workflow.name: Open Channel Workflow

sys_variable_value.value: // Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
Your AMA request Number: ${number} has been completed

Please Review your request by using the link below.
Number: ${number}
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
Your Question ${short_description} has been submitted to the AMA team
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.
You have been assigned an Open Channel Question
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.
Your Question has been rejected by the AMA admins. Please make corrections and resubmit.
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.
Please Research and address this question.
We have a commitment to our crewmembers to complete and return our AMA questions by 30 days.
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;

wf_activity.name: Wait for Question to be marked Compelte

sys_variable_value.value: // Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;

activity.display_value: Wait for Question to be marked Compelte

from.display_value: Wait for Question to be marked Compelte

to.display_value: Wait for Question to be marked Compelte
